topics.body:
"@Meresflut":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5539981a636872715e860a00#post_5539981a636872715e860a00
As long as you don't masturbate for ten hours.

If you want to have sex for ten hours then I would suggest either masturbating for thirty minutes whenever someone feels tired or such rather than constantly bumping.  There's been cases of people bumping even though the other person was tired and as a result their heart stops from over-exhaustion.

To use an analogy masturbation for hours or sex for hours is like a 10k marathon; I doubt most people running a marathon sprints the entire way and that is why most people can only last a couple minutes because they try to sprint a marathon.

"@Meresflut":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55399a4063687266a6d81600#post_55399a4063687266a6d81600
If someone wants to have sex for 12 hours then:
1)Hydrate
2)Have a bottle of water in case someone is thirsty
3)If someone has to go to the bathroom let them cause I don't think anyone wants a accident
4)Once someone orgasms then slowly have sex afterwords or masturbate each other instead because the actual act of sex is considered exercise cause of how many calories it burns
5)Only after both people are no longer tired proceed to bumping it again
6)For the love of god don't have sex for 12 hours straight cause that can easily kill a person through heart failure or such
7)Especially don't have sex for hours without rest if one person has heart medication.
